Text: Enron MetalsCopper concentrates Cc A company called Glencorp is interested in acquiring Enron Metals and especially its copper concentrates Its attorney Steve Reisman at Curtis Mallet can be contacted at I was advised all such inquiries should be channeled to you Thanks NOTE The information contained in this email message is intended only for use of the individual or entity named above If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient or the employee or agent responsible to deliver it to the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any dissemination distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited If you have received this communication in error please immediately notify us by telephone and destroy the original message Thank you
